attributes.action: intervene in the planning application for a mosque adjacent to Sandhurst in the interests of National Security
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Under planning legislation, the granting of planning permission is the responsibility of the elected local authority. 

Unless the appeal process is invoked, the local planning authority’s decision is final.

The Government cannot express a view on an individual planning application, because of the Secretary of State’s appellate role in the planning system.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
